price: 24. (Allahas tars angelams): „Abu jūs, meskite į Pragarą kiekvieną užsispyrusį netikintį (Allaho Vienumu ir Jo pranašais),
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
